ygData.subject: Re: ummmmmm..............who
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, Willy, if you don t like conversation, get off the list. Thats all I ve got to say.  No one wants to hear a flame about how pointless the conversation is.
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, Willy, if you don't like conversation, get off the list. Thats all I've
got to say. No one wants to hear a flame about how pointless the
conversation is. Even if it is a pointless conversation, it's much more
interesting than pressing <delete> every time we see a certain person's name
authoring a reply because he debases subjects based on his supposed knowledge
instead of taking into consideration other people's viewpoints.

Thanks!

"Lary, William" wrote:

> From: "Lary, William" <WLary@...>
>
> heh, arent druids the protecters of the forest? us rangers are just
> hybrids and are very useful tohunting parties:)
> Doublestar the ranger
>
> ----------
> From: EverQuest@onelist.com
> Sent: Friday, April 09, 1999 9:48 AM
> To: EverQuest@onelist.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] ummmmmm..............who are
>
> From: "Corporal Will" <privateryan8@...>
>
> please, I don't want these kind of e-mails, i don't give a crap about
> whether
> rangers should be with clerics, or necro's should be with WHOEVER!!
> the plain word is, Necro's are evil.
>
> Clerics are mostly holy, except for the dark elves.
>
> Rangers are just kind of loners who live to protect the forest,
>
> there ya go!!!!
>
